title: Did this game got any better since I left?
body: Just curious? Have not played in like 2 months

replies.body: Yeah its pretty much the same as it was

> [{quoted}](name=Death by Glamour,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=4edwAEYU,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-09-14T08:38:32.927+0000)
>
> Yeah its pretty much the same as it was

Not really; it's _worse._

> [{quoted}](name=lumanachi,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=4edwAEYU,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-09-14T08:11:47.392+0000)
>
> Just curious? Have not played in like 2 months

Balance wise, not really.

Meta wise.  It's not as cancerous as it was but it's still full of one shots.
Big fat no.
Hard nope.

as long as Teemo is allowed to walk the rift, League of legends will never be better.

The devil must be eliminated from the playing field, Only with the devil king Teemo's demise will the sun begin to raise signalling a new dawn, an era of hope for the citizens of the Rift.
it is then that you realize that Teemo is Emote respelled, just like Shaco is Chaos!
nop still trash
Yes it's better now

> [{quoted}](name=BigFBear,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=4edwAEYU,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2018-09-14T13:58:46.817+0000)
>
> Yes it's better now

How can you say that? all you do is play {{champion:106}}
How can you say that? all you do is play normals
I recommend waiting for preseason like everyone else.
It's the same garbage as it used to be before you left. Solution would be kicking out balance team.
No, it hasn't. Riot continues to buff things that are overpowered and nerf things that are underpowered. You are force to play in an extremely narrow champion pool because of the meta.
It got a bit better but idk season 9 will be better
still having hope for riot after 8 years lmao
Anything is better than season 8 right? Right??? Idk anymore tbh
It got better BECAUSE you left. You made Riot see the error of their ways.

> [{quoted}](name=ApocaIypse Meow,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=4edwAEYU,comment-id=001a,timestamp=2018-09-15T16:12:20.292+0000)
>
> It got better BECAUSE you left. You made Riot see the error of their ways.

Amen to that brother XD
Nope. The game is still the same shitshow as it always was back in preseason.
It's either the same, or worse by a longshot depending on someone's opinion. What is sure is that it really is far from getting better

They finally nerfed something like Electrocute, just to make other absurd changes like gutting Sejuani, Tahm and so on (people say 'cause LC$).
Plus, matchmaking is still (intentionally?) flawed, so nearly every game is a stomp for one side.
I remember they wanted to buff Tahm at the same time so he would be more viable top.. Lol Reddit screeched at Riot for that change. Nobody likes Tahm Kench.

They actually "buffed" him as a toplaner, technically. In practice, it's a joke :D And now he is dead as support.
Season 8 basically killed every tank. The only ones viable were the "abominations" that, being tanky, still used to deal TONS of damage (which is just BAD design). Or, the ones who can all-in effectively, in order to allow someone else to deal TONS of damage.
But no tank has been viable because "tank". This season is awful :D

**Season 8 basically killed every tank. The only ones viable were the "abominations" that, being tanky, still used to deal TONS of damage (which is just BAD design).** Outside of Nunu, when has a tank that deals no dmg ever been meta?

If i remember correctly, in S7 Alistar, Braumm, Sion, Malphite, Rammus and a couple more were viable, not because of their damage.
Tahm too had a good poking (considering), but his main feature was to be unkillable (fair or not).

Are you saying Alistar, Braum, Sion and Malphite are not viable lmao? Even Rammus is not horrible.

Tahms main feature was to be unkillable, impossible to outduel, being a huge cockblock, CC surpress you and then deal 32% of your max health in magic dmg, stun you, be tanky as fuck, have sustain and get a shield the same size as your hp bar. What was his weakness other than that he didnt have the best engage (but still having a roaming ult lmao)?
You thought Riot did something in only 2 months? You must be crazy, everything they've ever claimed to do is either next preseason, or "soon" (which actually means never).
You want the sincere answer or the diplomatic one?

It was pretty good 2 months ago anyway, only spoiled ADCs disagree.
It's better than then.
Not an adc player. Still disagree. What now?

Then we have different opinions, happens pretty often in the internet.

I don't know what was wrong with 8.11 meta really.
LOL I've quit for over a month and I already know its definitely not come back in Season 9 MAYBE {{sticker:sg-kiko}}
No
It is better than it was 2 months ago. It is not perfect, but it is better.

Game is fine in my opinion i can careless about patches because it doesnt effect me. I stopped cause of community crying over everything and toxic over anything doesnt matter the elo to much crying and toxicity
Yes, don't listen to the majority of the boards. They'll circlejerk that the game is shit to the ends of the earth

> [{quoted}](name=Cosmic Warper,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=4edwAEYU,comment-id=0011,timestamp=2018-09-14T17:45:16.818+0000)
>
> Yes, don't listen to the majority of the boards. They'll circlejerk that the game is shit to the ends of the earth


Yes, because it's pretty obvious that everyone is enjoying the current meta. Right? That's why Riot is creating advertisements and partnering with popular youtubers by giving them emote codes , to redraw some of its former audience , because noone is tired of the one-shot bullshit . People wouldn't "circlejerk" or leave if they game was good.

If u left because the state of the game 2 months ago was not to ur liking then i advise to just be an observer of proplay, enjoy worlds and start playing again in preseason, givin they go through with all the promised changes without having some last minute riot changes to them that screw them up. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
I think we have shifted into a pretty balanced state . I love this game .

Yeah, turrets are still made of paper but they are going to work on them so yeah, i'm kinda satisfied with the current state of the game. 



But don't tell Rito that {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
